file_content.text: I have placed my not-inconsiderable resources at your disposal. What else could you possibly want from me at this point?
Mister Hyland, sir, all the credits in the galaxy won't change that we don't have the caliber of help we need down here to face the rakghoul population!
No? Maybe you should take a better look around you. Hyland out.
Oh! Wow. Hello.
"Wow?" That's an understatement.
You should be more impressed.
I didn't realize THORN was handing out rewards for killing rakghouls.
Did you mention credits?
THORN pays its volunteers for results, if that's what you mean.
What can I do to help?
Tell me what you need.
What can we do to help?
Tell us what you need.
This is rakghoul ground zero down here. I can use anyone who's willing to wade into a sea of those things and do what needs to be done.
If you decide to walk, I can't say I'll blame you, but we might just be able to end this thing if we have your support.
Definitely. Absolutely! You honor us. Why don't I get you up to speed?
Please... help me....
Infected. I'll... I'll do what I can. Just don't touch me.
Stay safe. And stay vaccinated. Don't let the rakghouls turn you.
Those rakghouls aren't going to kill themselves, you know.
I'm a little busy trying run things down here without getting infected. No offense.
Heck of a good job. Just... keep a safe distance, okay? Just in case.
